instructions: On the iPhone Home screen, tap the Mail app. Swipe from left to right until the Mailboxes list is visible. Tap Edit . In the editing screen, tap the circles next to the mailboxes or folders you want to appear at the top of the Mailboxes list for easy access. Tap Done to save your selections and return to the Mailboxes screen. Each item you selected appears at the top of the Mailboxes list.
